item.description:
If you already have meditation experience, please join us for the centerâ€™s twice-monthly Open Meditation Evenings. Enjoy a tranquil atmosphere where your mind can rest and your spirit can be renewed. Bring your insights and questions for the short discussion period that follows meditation.

Always free! Stay for a refreshment break where you can chat with other center students.

Meets the first and third Wednesday of each month, from 7:15 to 8:30 PM. Theme for upcoming session is:

December 1 - Meditation and the practice of life

* Free (Donations welcome!)

For more information on meditation classes, please contact us at 781-647-0020 or info@advaitameditation.org.
item.name: Waltham Open Meditation
